title: Serif font to go with knockout
content:
I am looking for a serif face that has a formal relationship, or works well with knockout (juniorfeatherweight). Any thoughts or Ideas ?

 [‹ creating font?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828100136/http:/typophile.com/node/40927 "Go to previous forum topic") [Uncompromising Arabic Font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828100136/http:/typophile.com/node/19348 "Go to next forum topic")
author: ascheid

comments.content: I’m currently working on one project that pairs Chronicle Text with Knockout and the effect is quite nice.
